adjective.description: In the process of coming into being or becoming prominent.
examples: the emergent democracies of eastern Europe

adjective.description: Of or denoting a plant which is taller than the surrounding vegetation, especially a tall tree in a forest.

noun.description: An emergent tree or other plant.

origin: Late Middle English (in the sense occurring unexpectedly): from Latin emergent- arising from, from the verb emergere (see emerge).
